name: data-exploration
description: MCP server for autonomous data exploration on .csv-based datasets, providing intelligent insights with minimal effort. NOTE: Will execute arbitrary Python code on your machine, please use with caution!

examples.title: California Real Estate Listing Prices
examples.description: Exploring housing price trends in California using a dataset.
examples.prompt: csv_path: Local path to the CSV file, topic: Housing price trends in California.

examples.title: Weather in London
examples.description: Investigating daily weather history in London using a dataset.
examples.prompt: csv_path: Local path to the CSV file, topic: Weather in London.

tools.name: load_csv
tools.description:
Load CSV File Tool

Purpose:
Load a local CSV file into a DataFrame.

Usage Notes:
	•	If a df_name is not provided, the tool will automatically assign names sequentially as df_1, df_2, and so on.

tools.name: run_script
tools.description:
Python Script Execution Tool

Purpose:
Execute Python scripts for specific data analytics tasks.

Allowed Actions
	1.	Print Results: Output will be displayed as the script’s stdout.
	2.	[Optional] Save DataFrames: Store DataFrames in memory for future use by specifying a save_to_memory name.

Prohibited Actions
	1.	Overwriting Original DataFrames: Do not modify existing DataFrames to preserve their integrity for future tasks.
	2.	Creating Charts: Chart generation is not permitted.
